name: Kawasaki Ninja h2R
description: The Kawasaki Ninja H2R is the most powerful production bike on sale in India at present and churns out in excess of 300 bhp. The bike is not street-legal and is meant only for the racetrack. Powered by a 998 cc in-line four-cylinder engine, the motor comes with a supercharger.

name: Kawasaki Z900
description: The Metallic Spark Black features a single-tone finish along with a neon green shade for the chassis. The Candy Lime Green Type 3, on the other hand, features a dual-tone finish that includes lime green base paint with highlights of black on the front fender, fuel tank, and the rear panel.

name: Kawasaki Ninja 650
description: The BS6 Kawasaki Ninja 650 has received several cosmetic and mechanical updates. The 2020 Kawasaki Ninja 650 continues to come with a 649cc unit that delivers the same power and lesser torque as compared to BS4. It generates 68hp and 64Nm mated to a 6-speed transmission.

name: Kawasaki J300
description: An innovative urban transport solution, the J300 seamlessly blends sport, control, comfort and convenience, and wraps it all in a distinctive design that makes it instantlyrecognisable as a Kawasaki.The result is a package that will appeal to sports-minded riders looking for a daily dose of funfrom their commute.

name: Kawasaki Z800
description: Kawasaki Motors has rolled out a limited edition of its spirited street-fighter, Z800. Priced akin to its standard version (Rs 7.5 lakh, ex-showroom, Delhi), Kawasaki has produced just 10 units of the limited edition variant.
